snippet: Chess players who frequent a park in warm weather move inside to the St. Nicholas Chess and Backgammon Club in Harlem when it is cold.
abstract: Chess players who frequent a park in warm weather move inside to the St. Nicholas Chess and Backgammon Club in Harlem when it is cold;  art of the hustle can get lost amid players’ familiarity with one another.
lead_paragraph: Chess players who frequent a park in warm weather move inside to the St. Nicholas Chess and Backgammon Club in Harlem when it is cold.

headline.seo: Chess in a Harlem Park Moves Indoors for Winter
